source:
%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_harmonised_db.vw_Appeals_Event_Unified 
AS
SELECT 
    CONCAT(casenumber, '-',eventId) AS eventId
    ,caseNumber
    ,caseReference
    ,eventType
    ,eventName
    ,eventStatus
    ,isUrgent
    ,CAST(eventPublished AS boolean) AS eventPublished
    ,eventStartDateTime
    ,eventEndDateTime
    ,notificationOfSiteVisit
    ,dateEventRequested
    ,actualDuration
    ,eventAddressLine1 AS addressLine1
    ,eventAddressLine2 AS addressLine2
    ,eventAddressTown AS addressTown
    ,eventAddressCounty AS addressCounty
    ,eventAddressPostcode AS addressPostcode
    ,Migrated
    ,IngestionDate
    ,ValidTo
    ,RowID
    ,IsActive
    ,ODTSourceSystem
    ,SourceSystemID
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.horizon_appeals_event
UNION ALL -- Using union all as current plan is to not migrate history.
SELECT
    eventId
    ,caseReference AS caseNumber
    ,caseReference
    ,eventType
    ,eventName
    ,eventStatus
    ,isUrgent
    ,CAST(REPLACE(eventPublished, 'None', NULL) AS Boolean) AS eventPublished
    ,eventStartDateTime
    ,CAST(REPLACE(eventEndDateTime, 'None', NULL) AS Timestamp) AS eventPublished
    ,CAST(REPLACE(NotificationOfSiteVisit, 'None', NULL) AS String) AS NotificationOfSiteVisit
    ,NULL AS dateEventRequested
    ,NULL AS EventDuration
    ,addressLine1
    ,addressLine2
    ,addressTown
    ,addressCounty
    ,addressPostcode
    ,1 AS Migrated
    ,IngestionDate
    ,CAST(REPLACE(ValidTo, 'None', NULL) AS String) AS ValidTo
    ,RowID
    ,IsActive
    ,ODTSourceSystem
    ,SourceSystemID
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.sb_appeal_event

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_Appeals_Event_EntraDeDupe
AS
SELECT DISTINCT
    vw_Appeals_Event_Unified.eventId
    ,CASE WHEN NumberSystems > 1 THEN 'ODT' ELSE ODTSourceSystem END AS ODTSourceSystem
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.vw_Appeals_Event_Unified AS vw_Appeals_Event_Unified
    INNER JOIN (
                SELECT
                    eventId
                    ,COUNT(DISTINCT ODTSourceSystem) AS NumberSystems --Check if we have more than one dupe across source systems, if so we need to prioritise service bus as that will be the master
                FROM
                   odw_harmonised_db.vw_Appeals_Event_Unified
                GROUP BY
                    eventId) AS Intra_dupes
        ON vw_Appeals_Event_Unified.EventId = Intra_dupes.EventId

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_Appeals_Event_Input
AS
SELECT
    raw.*
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.vw_Appeals_Event_Unified AS raw
    INNER JOIN (
                SELECT
                    raw.eventId
                    ,raw.ODTSourceSystem
                    ,MAX(IngestionDate) AS LastLoaded
                FROM
                    odw_harmonised_db.vw_Appeals_Event_Unified AS raw
                    INNER JOIN vw_Appeals_Event_EntraDeDupe AS EntraDeDupe
                        ON raw.EventId = EntraDeDupe.EventID
                        AND raw.ODTSourceSystem = EntraDeDupe.ODTSourceSystem
                GROUP BY
                    raw.eventId
                    ,raw.ODTSourceSystem) AS InterDupe
        ON raw.EventId = InterDupe.EventID
        AND raw.ODTSourceSystem = InterDupe.ODTSourceSystem
        AND raw.IngestionDate = InterDupe.LastLoaded

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_Appeals_Event_Upsert
AS
SELECT -- Bring in net new records
    Source.eventId
    ,Source.caseNumber
    ,Source.caseReference
    ,Source.eventType
    ,Source.eventName
    ,Source.eventStatus
    ,Source.isUrgent
    ,Source.eventPublished
    ,Source.eventStartDateTime
    ,Source.eventEndDateTime
    ,Source.notificationOfSiteVisit
    ,Source.dateEventRequested
    ,Source.actualDuration
    ,Source.addressLine1
    ,Source.addressLine2
    ,Source.addressTown
    ,Source.addressCounty
    ,Source.addressPostcode
    ,Source.Migrated
    ,Source.IngestionDate
    ,Source.ValidTo
    ,Source.RowID
    ,Source.IsActive
    ,Source.ODTSourceSystem
    ,Source.SourceSystemID
    ,'Insert' AS Update_mode
FROM
    vw_Appeals_Event_Input AS Source
    LEFT OUTER JOIN odw_curated_db.appeals_event AS Target
        ON Source.eventId = Target.eventId
WHERE
    Target.eventID IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT -- Bring in records that have updates
    Source.eventId
    ,Source.caseNumber
    ,Source.caseReference
    ,Source.eventType
    ,Source.eventName
    ,Source.eventStatus
    ,Source.isUrgent
    ,Source.eventPublished
    ,Source.eventStartDateTime
    ,Source.eventEndDateTime
    ,Source.notificationOfSiteVisit
    ,Source.dateEventRequested
    ,Source.actualDuration
    ,Source.addressLine1
    ,Source.addressLine2
    ,Source.addressTown
    ,Source.addressCounty
    ,Source.addressPostcode
    ,Source.Migrated
    ,Source.IngestionDate
    ,Source.ValidTo
    ,Source.RowID
    ,Source.IsActive
    ,Source.ODTSourceSystem
    ,Source.SourceSystemID
    ,'Update' AS Update_mode
FROM
    vw_Appeals_Event_Input AS Source
    INNER JOIN odw_curated_db.appeals_event AS Target
        ON Source.eventId = Target.eventId
        AND Source.RowID <> Target.RowID
UNION ALL
SELECT -- Bring in the original record so that we can archive it off
    Target.eventId
    ,Target.caseNumber
    ,Target.caseReference
    ,Target.eventType
    ,Target.eventName
    ,Target.eventStatus
    ,Target.isUrgent
    ,Target.eventPublished
    ,Target.eventStartDateTime
    ,Target.eventEndDateTime
    ,Target.notificationOfSiteVisit
    ,Target.dateEventRequested
    ,Target.actualDuration
    ,Target.addressLine1
    ,Target.addressLine2
    ,Target.addressTown
    ,Target.addressCounty
    ,Target.addressPostcode
    ,Target.Migrated
    ,Target.IngestionDate
    ,Source.IngestionDate AS ValidTo
    ,Target.RowID
    ,'N' AS IsActive
    ,Target.ODTSourceSystem
    ,Target.SourceSystemID
    ,'Update' AS Update_mode
FROM
    vw_Appeals_Event_Input AS Source
    INNER JOIN odw_curated_db.appeals_event AS Target
        ON Source.eventId = Target.eventId
        AND Source.RowID <> Target.RowID

%%sql
MERGE INTO odw_curated_db.appeals_event AS Target -- Merge results into curated
USING vw_Appeals_Event_Upsert AS Source
    ON Target.EventID = Source.EventID
    AND Target.RowID = Source.RowID
WHEN MATCHED THEN -- De-activate old records
    UPDATE SET
        Target.IsActive = Source.IsActive
        ,Target.ValidTo = Source.ValidTo
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT
        (
            eventId
            ,caseNumber
            ,caseReference
            ,eventType
            ,eventName
            ,eventStatus
            ,isUrgent
            ,eventPublished
            ,eventStartDateTime
            ,eventEndDateTime
            ,notificationOfSiteVisit
            ,dateEventRequested
            ,actualDuration
            ,addressLine1
            ,addressLine2
            ,addressTown
            ,addressCounty
            ,addressPostcode
            ,Migrated
            ,IngestionDate
            ,ValidTo
            ,RowID
            ,IsActive
            ,ODTSourceSystem
            ,SourceSystemID
        )
    VALUES
        (
            Source.eventId
            ,Source.caseNumber
            ,Source.caseReference
            ,Source.eventType
            ,Source.eventName
            ,Source.eventStatus
            ,Source.isUrgent
            ,Source.eventPublished
            ,Source.eventStartDateTime
            ,Source.eventEndDateTime
            ,Source.notificationOfSiteVisit
            ,Source.dateEventRequested
            ,Source.actualDuration
            ,Source.addressLine1
            ,Source.addressLine2
            ,Source.addressTown
            ,Source.addressCounty
            ,Source.addressPostcode
            ,Source.Migrated
            ,Source.IngestionDate
            ,Source.ValidTo
            ,Source.RowID
            ,Source.IsActive
            ,Source.ODTSourceSystem
            ,Source.SourceSystemID
        )
